peskas.timor.data.pipeline 1.4.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Upload and create Airtable records to a base

    air_upload_records.Rd

    Takes a list created by tibble_to_air_records() and uploads it to Airtable. If request_type is set to "update" the body list must have an id field for each record. Each element of body must be up to 10 records long.

    air_upload_records(
  body,
  table,
  base_id,
  api_key = Sys.getenv("AIRTABLE_KEY"),
  request_type = c("create", "update")
)

    Arguments

    body

    list with the records, as formatted by tibble_to_air_records()

    table

    name of the table (string)

    base_id

    id of the Airtable base where the table is located

    api_key

    API key for Airtable. By default it looks at the AIRTABLE_KEY environment variable.

    request_type

    Whether to create a new record or update an existing one. If updating an existing one, an id_field needs to be specified when calling tibble_to_air_records()

    Value

    List of request responses

    Contents

    Developed by Fernando Cagua, Lorenzo Longobardi.
